'''Brian Fortune''' is an Irish actor based in Dublin.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he plays the role ofÂ [[Othell Yarwyck]], the [[Night's Watch]] [[First Builder]]. The actor had appeared in [[Season 1]] as an unnamedÂ 'Night's WatchÂ Officer' at first believed to be [[Bowen Marsh]], but the character was explicitly identified as Yarwyck in Season 4 and [[Michael Condron]] was cast as Bowen Marsh for Season 5.
